programme.title: Saka Viral

programme.title: Al Kisah Pak Kodi 5G

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle S4 Part 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: New season of Lip Sync Battle, featuring stars like Christina Aguilera, Fifth Harmony, Rita Ora and Rob Schneider.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports - EP 9
programme.desc: This series features sports mishaps, crashes and bloopers from all around the world.

programme.title: Code Of Law S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: A schoolteacher is murdered in cold blood in full view of her husband. Coupled with the shock of the killing is the fact that it could've been committed by one of her own students. When Jacob and Sabrina agree to represent the Accused, they take on more than they bargained for.

programme.title: The Strangest Weather On Earth S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Series explores a range of fascinating weather events. Meet the eyewitnesses caught up in extraordinary events and discover the science behind these bizarre phenomena.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 28
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Hosts Kevin Pereira and Brooke Van Poppelen explore and demonstrate the world of hacks, short cuts and cheats, that can be time and money-saving .

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 68
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes "The Voice" coach Blake Shelton and Ayesha Curry (ellentube original digital series, "Fempire with Ayesha Curry"). Blake Shelton performs "Hell Right" from his latest album, "Fully Loaded: God's Country".

programme.title: Nature Cat S1 - EP 73
programme.desc: Nature Cat can't wait to get outside for a day of backyard nature excursions and bravery with friends! But there's 1 problem, he's still a house cat with no real instincts for nature. That doesn't stop this passionate and curious feline, who loves learning and experiencing all he can about nature.

programme.title: Lexi & Lottie - EP 6
programme.desc: Being identical twin sisters is an asset for 12-year-old detectives Lexi and Lottie, especially when it comes to cracking crimes in their home town of Appleton and its Animal Park. With their pet mouse which has a nose for clues, and their smart comic journalist friend Fred, the friends set about to solving crimes in their local neighborhood!

programme.title: Dot - EP 23
programme.desc: Dot is an 8-year old inquisitive and exuberant tech-savvy girl who launches herself into adventures and fearlessly sets about solving problems by making mistakes and laughing even more along the way.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 9
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets, along with his best friend, Ruby invents his way out of every jam by re-purposing parts and objects into the coolest contraption ever.

programme.title: Tobot S4 - EP 15
programme.desc: More adventures from "Tobots", cars that transform into robots to fight crime and protect their neighbourhood.

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots S4 - EP 15
programme.desc: The Rescue Bots are Transformers that work with a family of heroes to rescue humans from disasters.

programme.title: Astroblast - EP 23
programme.desc: The coolest crew in the galaxy and the stars of the show; Comet, Halley, Sputnik, Radar and Jet are co-workers at the Frosty Star smoothie shop and the best of friends. Sure they are different, sure they make mistakes but through it all, the Astroblast family embraces their differences, makes new friends and discovers that working together makes everything better.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Hiccup is excited about setting up her own cafe, but soon discovers that being a chef, waitress, cleaner and entertainer all at the same time - may be a little too much to handle!

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 9
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets, along with his best friend, Ruby invents his way out of every jam by re-purposing parts and objects into the coolest contraption ever.

programme.title: Shimmer And Shine S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: From unexpected dinosaur pets and dragon guests to surprise treasure hunts and beyond, hilarious magical adventures are never far away with the two genies-in-training and three wishes a day.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 29
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: Home Together - EP 21
programme.desc: In today's episode, Mandopop couple Alfred Sim and Tay Kewei reveal how they are coping during the circuit breaker period as they await the arrival of their second child while Jetstar Asia employees talk about their challenges on a different work front. Meanwhile, celebrity chef Sarah Huang Benjamin shares her curry shepherd's pie recipe.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe CLASS 95 - EP 30
programme.desc: Join Yasminne Cheng Live! as she hosts Lunchbreak on CLASS 95.

programme.title: Kin - EP 397
programme.desc: Ah Yoke returns from overseas but continues to avoid the Shelleys. The Lohs give Debbie a warm welcome after her release from prison. Due to Ananya's warning, Syirah ends her friendship with Nina.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37 - EP 7075
programme.desc: (Encore) This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: You Deserve A Break 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Madam Fauziah has many regrets but her greatest one was that her own son called her aunty as he was given away when he was a baby. The only holiday she ever took was decades ago when she went to KL with her two other children and all she wanted was to recreate that trip for Syahir who was not in the family photo. Will they make the trip?

programme.title: The Enchantimals: Tales From Everwilde - EP 11
programme.desc: Join the Enchantimals on their exciting adventures, where they head to Frozenwood in search of an ice cream that never melts and visit Grazy Grasslands, to help Merrit Monkey and Cherish Cheetah Enchantimals find the cure for hiccupitis!

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 17
programme.desc: Arashi longs to follow his father's footsteps to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner. He partners up with the Wild Liger and forms the new Team Freedom. Together, they will face many adventures, including the main antagonists the Death Metal Empire!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 - EP 19
programme.desc: SpongeBob, Patrick, Squidward and the rest of the Bikini Bottom crew return for more hilarious adventures!

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S8 - EP 25
programme.desc: In the new Season 8, exciting new creatures join the Mane 6 (Twilight Sparkle, Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy), including Silverstream the Hippogriff-Seapony, Smolder the Dragon and Yona the Yak, as they go on new epic adventures throughout new and familiar lands such as Mount Aris, Everfree Forest, Las Pegasus and more!

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 41
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Museum Mysteries - EP 4
programme.desc: Time-travelling historian and explorer extraordinaire, Captain Mer Lai En, is on a quest to recruit crew members to join him on his artefact collecting missions all around the world and all across time! Not only do crew members have to help solve all of the Captain's challenges and puzzles in his museum, they must also help Captain Mer Lai En fix the time-machine's flux chronometer. Will they succeed? Find out in Museum Mysteries!

programme.title: Make You Laugh Out Loud S4a - EP 5
programme.desc: The funniest videos on the internet, guaranteed to Make You Laugh Out Loud. This show celebrates the amazing wealth of talented and funny animals and people to be found on the internet. Featuring the best UGC from around the world, behavioural experts and other comedy talent providing a commentary into the world of LOL.

programme.title: Home Together - EP 21
programme.desc: (Encore) In today's episode, Mandopop couple Alfred Sim and Tay Kewei reveal how they are coping during the circuit breaker period as they await the arrival of their second child while Jetstar Asia employees talk about their challenges on a different work front. programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S4 - EP 18
programme.desc: Two contestants, each with a celebrity partner, must guess words from their partners' clues; then the roles are reversed. Winners face the pyramid.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 - EP 1
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In THE CARBONARO EFFECT, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: Kin - EP 398
programme.desc: With Jenny's counsel, Zaryf aligns with Zara and works through his issues about helping Dr Shen via Yang. Ah Yoke is forced to attend a Shelley meeting that ends in a stalemate. Ah Hock struggles not to blurt out about Emily after Rickson accuses him of being cold to Debbie.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: In Your Living Room With PCK And Jojo - EP 4
programme.desc: (Encore) It is Chu Kang's birthday but he can't go out to celebrate his special day. Watch as your mouth waters when actress Michelle Wong teaches us how to make a chocolate cake with just 2 ingredients! Oli DJ Vimala finally finds time to do all the things around the home that she has always wanted to do, but never had time for. Wah Banana makes us laugh at the funny things that happen when a family have to stay together 24-7. Finally take a listen to Inch's song - Mousedeer, shot in her home studio.

programme.title: In Our Time - EP 2
programme.desc: Global trends, evolving lifestyles, new influences and an emerging identity. A throwback to a decade when a new nation came of age.

programme.title: NCIS S17 - EP 2
programme.desc: With their lives in danger, Gibbs and Ziva's rogue investigation takes an unexpected turn when a possible terrorist plot is revealed.

programme.title: Talking Point - EP 6

programme.title: Death Is Our Business - EP 1
programme.desc: Roland Tay is a veteran undertaker behind the funerals of some of Singapore's most high-profile deaths. His daughter, Jenny and her fiance, Darren joined the business three years ago. Amidst the many funeral cases they handle, the couple is also planning to get married in a few months. Today, they need to attend to an urgent case - a Singaporean has died tragically in Batam and the family of undertakers need to act fast to bring his body back.

Let's see what they have in store for us! 这一集，宅星李腾和杨志龙要展开刀叉战！ 平时主持很多美食节目的李腾到底厨艺如何？厨艺精湛的杨志龙会给大家怎样的惊喜？两位艺人如何在限时30分钟内必须用神秘食材“鸡蛋”烹煮出一道料理呢？ 究竟是谁的宅星食谱更诱人？记得锁定节目！.

programme.title: 阿贤逛巴刹 Jason's Market Trails S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Host Jason Yeoh explores food markets and street stalls around Malaysia and delves into the human tales and history behind each tasty bite. 跟随阿贤的脚步逛巴刹，在老味道里追寻新的生命力。节目将纪录全马各地巴刹的老滋味，以感受劳动民众一天最早甦醒的好时光。.

programme.title: 剃头刀 阿签传奇 Titoudao: Inspired By The True Story Of A Wayang Star - EP 3
programme.desc: Ah Chiam and Ah Dui join the Wayang Troupe Sin Sai Hong, Ah Chiam puts in effort to learn while Ah Dui is uninterested. Ah Long and Ah Zai are unhappy with Ah Ngor for being late to the show as she was on a date with her boyfriend, thus Ah Long gets Ah Chiam to replace Ah Ngor in order for the show to start on time. Ah Chiam experiences the feeling of being on the stage for the first time. (PG-性相关语)阿签和阿对加入新赛凤歌仔戏团，阿签用心学习，阿对则没有兴趣。班主魏文的哥哥魏成对阿对心怀不轨，乘机接近她。阿娥因与男友约会而演出迟到，令阿隆和阿财不满，为了准时开锣，阿隆让阿签代替阿娥上场，阿签初尝登上舞台的滋味。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 2 Garden Of Treasure S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: The focus of the second season of "Garden Of Treasure " include gastrointestinal care, treatment for wound inflammation, hair care, reducing cough and fever symptoms, and care for gynecological issues, so that the audience can more harness the use of herbal medicine. 寻花探草”第二季以寻常病症作为主打，包括肠胃护理、外伤消炎、护发补益、止咳退烧、到妇科调理，让观众能更具体掌握草药的治疗用途。.

programme.title: 甘榜情 Kampong Ties - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Red sores appear on Shuixian's leg and she brushes it aside, thinking they are mosquito bites. Her mother-in-law sees the sores and realises Lihai has infected Shuixian. Worried that they have to foot Shuixian's medical bills, her parents-in-law decide to abandon her and get her to sign a document. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)水仙脚上出现红色斑点，开始溃烂，她以为是被蚊子叮，所以不在意，但头家娘见了之后，肯定立海身上的病毒已经感染给水仙。她担心要负担水仙的医药费，于是与牛奶王商量，要密谋将水仙遗弃，骗水仙签下一份文件。.

programme.title: 甘榜情 Kampong Ties - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Shuixian discovers her foetus is infected with the disease during a body checkup and thus the chance of her baby born with deformities is high. Her mother-in-law forces her to get an abortion but she refuses, insisting to follow Yueman's example of raising a child with deformities. Her mother-in-law then arranges for a nurse to forcefully perform the abortion. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)水仙到医院检查，发现腹中胎儿被病毒感染，生下畸形婴儿的可能性很高。头家娘逼着要水仙堕胎，水仙坚持不肯，还说要以月满为榜样，养育有缺陷的孩子，头家娘气得说不出话来，于是安排护士上门，要为水仙强行堕胎。.

programme.desc: (R) Lie Ruge has been engaged to her eldest senior, Zhan Feng, for three years. However, Zhan Feng cheated on her with a courtesan called Ying Yi. Yu Zihan informs Ruge that Zhan Feng has told their master, Lie Mingjing, to annul his engagement with Ruge. Yin Xue claims to be Lie Mingjing's old friend, and joins Yu Zihan and Ruge as they embark on their journey back to Flame Villa. Ruge is heartbroken when Zhan Feng treats her coldly. (PG)(重)烈如歌早在三年前就和大师兄战枫定亲，但战枫移情别恋了叫莹衣的青楼女子。玉自寒告诉如歌，战枫向师父烈明镜提出了退婚。银雪说他和烈明镜是朋友，并与玉自寒和如歌一起回到烈火山庄。如歌在瀑布边找到了正在练功的战枫。战枫对她冷言冷语，伤透了如歌的心。.

programme.title: 烈火如歌 The Flame's Daughter - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Lei Jinghong, the young heir to Pi Li Sect, seeks Yin Xue's help to let him and Dao Liexiang stay at Flame Villa. Lei Jinghong divulges to Dao Liexiang that his reason for doing so stems from his discovery that his step-mother had given birth to a baby girl, but the baby was stillborn. After some investigation, Lei Jinghong finds out that the baby was sent to Flame Villa, and he intends to find the whereabouts of his step-sister. (PG)(重)霹雳门少主雷惊鸿让银雪帮他和刀无暇的妹妹刀冽香留在烈火山庄。雷惊鸿告诉刀冽香说他进入烈火山庄另有目的。他的继母艳娘当年曾经生过一个女孩，但是很快就夭折了。经过调查，这个女孩就在烈火山庄，他来这里也是为了找自己同父异母的妹妹。.

(重)这一集，主持人将介绍经典怀旧游戏打弹珠！接着，他们前往科尼岛公园进行户外探索活动，了解那里的自然生态。主持人还拜访玩具收藏家，见识到70至90年代的玩具。最后，他们将示范如何利用塑料瓶，来制作保龄球游戏！.

programme.title: The Wish - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) 15-year old Muhammad Sayfullah has cerebral palsy, a disorder that severely limits his speech and movement. While unable to play sports and games like other kids, Sayfullah has a special passion for art and animals. Find out how The Wish team helped Sayfullah's digital talents gain public recognition. (重)15岁的賽夫拉患有脑瘫，这种疾病严重限制了他的言语和动作。 尽管无法像其他孩子一样参加体育运动和游戏，賽夫拉对艺术和动物有着特殊的热情。让我们看“聚爱圆梦" 团队 如何帮助賽夫拉.,让他的数码的绘画艺术天赋获得公众认可。.

programme.title: 烈火如歌 The Flame's Daughter - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Lie Ruge tests Ying Yi, and discovers she has martial arts skills. It dawns on Ruge that Ying Yi has been pretending to be weak and fragile to gain Zhan Feng's sympathy. Lie Mingjing agrees to annul Zhan Feng and Ruge's engagement. Ruge returns the love-token that Zhan Feng gave her, and announces that they are strangers from now on. (PG)(重)烈如歌试出莹衣是会武功的，她明白莹衣一直是在装娇弱，博得战枫的垂怜。烈明镜解除了战枫和如歌的婚约。如歌交还了战枫送的信物，两人从此再无瓜葛。.

programme.title: 烈火如歌 The Flame's Daughter - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Yu Zihan has to return to the palace to visit his ill father, the Emperor, but is reluctant to part with Lie Ruge. Lie Mingjing gives the Flame Token to Ruge as a birthday present in hope that she can become the Lord of Flame Villa. Ruge declines, and expresses her wish to leave Flame Villa with Yin Xue. (PG)(重)因为父皇病重，玉自寒即将回京，但他却对烈如歌恋恋不舍。烈明镜在如歌生辰的时候，想将烈火令交给如歌。但是如歌不想当庄主，她想跟随银雪离开烈火山庄去闯荡江湖。.

programme.desc: Little Monkey King wants to become the Great Monkey King, so he went out to acquire skills. On the way, in order to avoid the puppy, he transformed himself into a doll. programme.title: 乐学每疫刻 3 Learn Together With Me S3 - EP 4
programme.desc: This episode of Learn Together With Me guest stars Michelle Chia, learn simple recipes with Chef Anna Phua and how to create a beautiful greeting card with watercolours with Chen Xiu Huan and the President of the Singapore Watercolour Society, Mr Seah Kang Chui. 这一集的《乐学每疫刻》邀请了特别来宾谢韵仪来谈网上娱乐。一起和潘秀霞老师学习简单又有营养的食谱。陈秀环和新加坡水彩画会长谢江水教你如何绘制美丽的水彩画。.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe LOVE 972 - EP 27
programme.desc: Join Kenneth & Lee Nah 'LIVE' from the studios of Love 972.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 22
programme.desc: Qingchen entered the Feng residence, suspecting many secrets hidden in the death of Elder daughter, Feng Xianwu. Even Luanfei does not know the cause of her death. Qingchen even discovered that Luanfei is secretly working for Yuanming. 卿尘入了凤府，疑心到底纤舞身上藏着多少秘密，竟连鸾飞都不知道她的死因。卿尘也发现鸾飞竟然是元溟的人。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 396
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 17
programme.desc: Zi Jun and Sen Mei visits the law firm to sign the divorce papers. To speed up the process, Sen Mei admits to the adultery and Zi Jun is shocked! Sen Mei analyses the rejected policies and realizes a mysterious point. She suspects that money laundering activity during the purchase of the policies. She informs Guan Ming but he tells her to stop investigating. After Sen Mei pursues persistently, Guan Ming shares that she is actually the one part of the money laundering activity. 子骏和森美到律师楼办离婚手续，森美为了速战速决，承认通奸，子骏愕然。森美研究退保保单，发现疑点，怀疑那些保户是通过买保险洗黑钱。她通报冠铭，谁知冠铭却叫她不要再追查。在森美追问下，冠铭指其实洗黑钱的人是森美！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 25
programme.desc: (25B) Kennis's operation is successful. YT suggests that Tang Ming take over as the CEO of Marshall Paxton. Tang Ming then realizes that the healthcare reform plan has already deviated from the original intention.(25C) Zoe and Tang Ming decide to tie the knot. They decide to invite Kennis, who has been serving with Doctors Without Borders overseas for three years, to return to Hong Kong to be their bridesmaid. (25B) 洛雯手术成功。逸滔向唐明提议接任明成北院长，唐明方知医改方案已经变质。(25C) 苏怡与唐明决定要结婚，还决定要邀请已在外国担任无国界医生三年的洛雯回港做他们的伴娘。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 8
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 擅长西餐料理的王辅立，收到詹姆士的战帖，一起到南投去寻找食材，并用所找到的食材进行一场料理PK大战。但没想到厨艺战还没开始，两个大男人竟被土里的「虫」吓到秒变娘！这到底是怎么回事呢？你相信吗？在南投有一个村庄的鹿比人还多？詹姆士跟王辅立的厨艺大战，战果又是如何呢？.

programme.title: 剃头刀 阿签传奇 Titoudao: Inspired By The True Story Of A Wayang Star - EP 6
programme.desc: Ah Chiam fights for a role in Titoudao, but faces difficulties due to her height. Ah Zai designs new moves to allow Ah Chiam to portray the role convincingly.. Ah Chiam's lively performance surprises Master Gwee, who decides to let her have the role. 阿签争取演出《剃头刀》，但因个子太矮，始终演不了那场与老虎搏斗的武打戏。阿财灵机一动，决定设计新动作，尝试与传统不同的方式来演绎《剃头刀》。阿签生动的演出让魏文惊艳，决定让她演出这个角色。.

programme.title: 法医秦明之幸存者 Medical Examiner Dr Qin: Survivor - EP 1
programme.desc: Ep 1 Ver B: A naked male corpse is found on a railway track. The deceased is confirmed to be an influencer, Luo Dake. Next, a gambler is suspected to have murdered his wife.Ep 1 Ver C: Lin Tao is sure that Chen Zhiquan has murdered his wife, but Qin Ming has other views. In the meantime, the police suspect that Luo Dake could have been murdered by an enemy. Ep 1 Ver B: 两名铁路巡逻员发现一具全身赤裸的男尸。警方证实死者是网络直播红人罗大可。另外，一名赌徒涉嫌杀害他的妻子李秀英。 Ep 1 Ver C: 林涛认定是陈志全把妻子杀死的，但秦明却不认同。另外，警方在罗大可的私人油箱里发现了恐吓信，初步推断罗大可的死因为仇杀。.

programme.title: 最佳利益 Best Interest - EP 15

(重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 3
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and English) Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. At the end of each episode, relevant spokespersons will share with viewers various precautionary measures one could take when caught in similar situations. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 13

Eric admits that he has been carrying a torch for Shengzhu.Shengzhu needs quick cash and thus sells her car to her colleague cheaply.Ep 22Longmin does not approve his sister dating the spendthrift Shengtai, but he has to give his blessings to them as Tingwei is pregnant Ep 21三位奶奶来胜珠家想找作斗，却被胜珠的母亲赶走，并告诉她们胜珠和作斗已经分手了。艾瑞克偷藏胜珠照片的事情被作斗发现，只好承认自己暗恋过韩胜珠。胜珠为了减轻经济负担，只好将车便宜卖给同事。Ep 22龙民反对妹妹和败家子胜泰交往，但庭薇已经怀孕，所以龙民只好答应让他们在一起。胜珠的母亲也对庭薇这个不懂事的女生很反感，不想要接受这样的媳妇。作斗只愿意让胜珠拍自己的记录片。景淑劝胜珠帮吴赫拍记录片，但被她拒绝。.

programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 2
programme.desc: Each missing person represents a broken family. According to statistics from the Taiwan Police Department, Taiwan has nearly 25,000 people reported missing and more than 200 unknown bodies have been uncovered every year. Why do people go missing in Taiwan? 每一名失踪人口，代表一个破碎家庭。根据台湾警政署资料统计，台湾平均每年通报受理将近2万5千起失踪人口，两百多具无名尸体被发现的案例。茫茫人海，寻人好比大海捞针，怎么可能容易？.

programme.title: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S4 - EP 8
programme.desc: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S4 is an info-ed series aimed at helping viewers to stay healthy, helps them understand and keep up to date with the latest health advisories. The programme will feature exercise routines by Wan Shamsury, healthy recipes by Chef Bob, doctor's interview with Dr Muhammad Iqbal Abdullah and skit segment with Suhaimi Yusof and Khairudin Samsudin. This series is anchored by Shahril Wahid.

programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 8
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Muz & Ika is a light-hearted musical drama, an adaptation of the evergreen classic movie, Grease. Muz is a young city lad obsessed with Rock Kapak music, while Ika is a kampung girl who loves traditional music especially dondang sayang. Ika first meets Muz when he is on holiday in Mersing. Smitten by her, he at first pretends to be interested in traditional music. But pretense turns into deep affection for both Ika and her music. They part only to be reunited in Singapore when she leaves the kampung for a job in Singapore.To save face among his Rock Kapak friends, he pretends not to like Ika and her traditional music. Ika is devastated with his change of ways and heart. When he secretly tries to tell her his true feelings, she rejects him calling him a 'fake' and 'coward'.Would Muz stand up for himself regardless of his friends and reveal to the world his love for Ika and traditional music?

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 14
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. Conflict arise between Raisya and Azraf's mothers when both want their kids to stay with them after the wedding. This puts Azraf and Raisya in a dilemma on who house should they choose. To please both, they decided to stay at the hotel instead.

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Khalil and Kinah must keep their relationship from their parents because of an ongoing feud with regards to their family business. Making things more interesting is how their respective culinary skills result in a lovely relationship between the children, but hatred between the parents. However, fate will decide everything.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 8
programme.desc: Iskandar realises that Aisyah is serious about their marriage and is not staying with him because of his wealth. Fasha and Farid argue about household chores responsibilities. Tengku Maria wishes for Iskandar and Waiduri to get married as quickly as possible. Siti Aisyah lives with her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. Her best friend, Ros advises her to leave the house quickly after noticing bruises on her. Tengku Iskandar receives a warning from his father that if he refuses to change to become a better person, he will not be able to take over TG Holdings.

programme.title: Menanti Syawal
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. The hour-long drama focuses on Syawal, a photojournalist in his mid-30s, and Amira, a young lawyer in her early 30s. The two are as different as chalk and cheese. Amira is a prim and proper lawyer who complements her pastel-coloured tudungs with smart pantsuits. She is also active in social work. A supremely confident young woman, finding a husband is the least of her concerns, in contrast to the worry her mum has.Syawal, on the other hand, is an easygoing fellow. But beneath that carefree attitude lies a responsible person that puts even Amira to shame when she discovers the real person. But while their friendship progresses, Amira is reluctant to take it to the next step, much to Syawal's disappointment.Syawal subsequently heads for the Middle East during Ramadan 2011 to perform the umrah before going to Egypt for some photography assignment. A replay of the Arab Spring at Cairo's Tahrir Square during that period leaves Amira wonderi.

programme.title: Lap Lip
programme.desc: When Alias's granddaughters asked why he has never put up lap-lip for Hari Raya - his response is simple; their grandmother got electrocuted by lap-lip and that's why he do not want history to repeat itself. But the true history goes way back, Alias and his brother Mokhsin were the ones who brought in the electric lap-lip hype to Jalan Hari Raya after moving in from Malaysia. That became an annual competition. It's all fun and friendly till one year - things took a turn. Alias refuses to tell his grandchildren why he does not put up lap-lip for Hari Raya. However, the truth is that Alias and his brother Mokhsin were the ones who brought in the electric lap-lip hype to Jalan Hari Raya after moving in from Malaysia, which eventually became an annual competition. It was all fun and friendly till one year — things took a bad turn and their relationship sours to no return.

programme.title: Anak Bulan
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Borrowing formulas from successful Hari Raya Aidilfitri telemovies, Anak Bulan is a nostalgic festive comedy nest described as Bubur Masjid, Air Katira meets Fighting Spiders. What will happen when Muhammad and Zaki’s families tell them that the “anak bulan” will appear earlier than expected? Will they be able to complete their raya preparations on time?

programme.title: Suara Takbir
programme.desc: Three brothers aim for a set of Baju Raya yet it turned out for a more meaningful gift for the entire family in the end when the youngest brother can now hear the sound of Takbir. Three brothers aim for a set of Baju Raya yet it turned out for a more meaningful gift for the entire family in the end when the youngest brother can now hear the sound of Takbir.

programme.title: Raya Sempurna
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Raya Sempurna (Perfect Raya).

programme.title: Baju Raya Ekslusif
programme.desc: Shunurin and Hazwani are cousins. This year, they plan to sell exclusive clothes online. In town they meet Ramlah who introduced herself as a boutique agent. Upon hearing Ramlah's business plans, Shunurin and Hazwani are interested to use their saving as capital for the start-up of the business. Their business flourishes. However, at the end of the fasting month, Ramlah disappeared with their money.

programme.title: Ketuk Ketuk Syawal 2018
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite cooking show, Ketuk Ketuk Syawal is back. In this one hour special edition, Sheila travels to Japan. Featuring guest artistes Rita Rudaini joins them as they share more about their preparations for Aidilfitri. Also catch exclusive bloopers and behind the scenes from the previous episodes of Ketuk Ketuk Ramadan.

programme.title: Raya Kolumpo
programme.desc: Raya Kolumpo tells a story about Mr Jalal for the first time he wants to celebrate Raya Aidilfitri in Kuala Lumpur with his family. This led to some conflicts in their families when he wanted to celebrate Raya in KL. Various incidents occurred when Mr Jalal was trying to bring "kampung feel" to the city.

programme.title: 17 Puasa
programme.desc: A sequal of 16 Puasa, this is a comedic story of six bumbling friends who constantly face difficulties to fast during Ramadan. Working together, they always find ways to consume their midday meals - but not this time. They are sent to visit Hospital Tanjung Rambutan for Rashid's health, where they face many obstacles that prevent them from eating - including bumping into a hearse that reminds them of the end of time.

programme.title: Bintang Minggu Ini - Dato Siti Nurhaliza
programme.desc: "Bintang Minggu Ini' with Dato Siti Nurhaliza is a special an hour and a half variety show in conjuction with Hari Raya. The show is hosted by Sherry Al-Hadad and Nabil Ahmad guest artist Syafiq Farhain.

programme.title: Raya Kali Ini
programme.desc: The story of 3 sisters who have different lives. Alya and Aimy married a communal while Alisa married a rich guy and live in affluent with her children. The luxurious lifestyle made Alisa and her children proud.

programme.title: 1,2 Bakar Raya
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Chef Anis is busy preparing Raya special dishes and delicacies for invited guests.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 17
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it.

programme.title: Manja 5 - EP 8
programme.desc: Maintaining the MANJA branding, the content encompasses guest interviews, fashion, food, games-challenges and more. The format is VT and Live in studio. Each episode carries a specific theme which will thread the segments together. The five key segments are Tamu Minggu Ini (Chat with studio guests), Estetika (Beauty, Styling, Interior Design), Holistik (DIY, Life hacks), Makan Tiub (Food) and Bro-Sis Cuba (Activities). Spotlight (Local Entertainment Highlights will supplement these main segm.

programme.title: Nandu - EP 6
programme.desc: Nandu is the story of a retrenched office girl who strikes out on her own to start a Fish Head Curry stall in an old neighbourhood coffeeshop. Her inexperience makes her an easy target and a disgruntled colleague schemes and plots extravagant ruses to throw her out of business.

programme.title: Housefull 2
programme.desc: Four men join hands to date and marry the women of their dreams by changing their identities and deceiving their prospective fathers-in-law.

programme.desc: Excercise.

programme.title: Velunatchi - EP 82

programme.desc: 'Raama Seetha' is a heart touching story that revolves around two protagonists - Vasudhev and Meenakshi with completely different mindset.

programme.title: Thuninthu Sel - EP 6
programme.desc: In this week's episode, Kumar travels to Hanoi, Vietnam, with the very bubbly Anandha Kannan. These two create a ruckus in Sapa Valley where they become rice farmers with the Red Tsao tribe. Anandha Kannan is also put to the task of entertaining their children who speak no Tamil at all.

programme.title: Savithiri - EP 11
programme.desc: This drama series is a refreshing contemporary adaptation of the classic novel, to kill a mocking bird, which seeks to examine the human condition, relationships with family and community and social values such as social inclusiveness and cohesivenes.

programme.title: Thalli Pogathey - EP 13
programme.desc: Samar is announced dead. What happens to Ramya now? Will she give up on her search for Samar or decide to move on?

programme.title: Rinus van de Ven
programme.sub-title: Road to Red Bull Knock Out
programme.desc: Rinus van de Ven is back in the game with a goal to place within the top 25 of Red Bull Knock Out 2018. In the late '90s Rinus van de Ven was one of motocross' finest riders. But serious injuries took him out of the game for a long time. Rinus is back with a goal to place within the top 25 of Red Bull Knock Out 2018.

programme.title: Tuapse to Sochi
programme.desc: As skate pioneers on the road to Sochi, the guys must be on the lookout for any spots that show potential. Being a skate pioneer means always looking out for spots with potential. The keen-eyed crew shreds everything from roadside ditches to the untapped spots of Sochi, where they are the first people to skate the Olympic city's gaps, stairs, and ledges.

programme.title: Gisela Pulido
programme.desc: Kitesurfer Gisela Pulido, the 10-times world title winner, returns home to retrace the story of her life. After winning her 10th word title, kitesurfer Gisela Pulido returns to her hometown of Premià de Mar, Spain to retrace the steps of her remarkable life. With the separate support of her mother and father, Gisela's career has been a dream come true.

programme.title: Pororoca
programme.desc: A group of surfers travel to a remote part of the Amazon in an attempt to ride a destructive tidal wave. On every new and full moon, an enormous tidal wave occurs along the lower Amazon. It's a tempting target for surfers despite the many dangers involved, and it offers few who brave it the longest continuous rides of their lives.

programme.title: Arcade Renaissance
programme.desc: Home gaming consoles may have put video arcades on the endangered list, but it's not 'game over' just yet. Before the advent of home consoles, video arcades were the gathering place for gamers. Once on the endangered species list, they are now enjoying a renaissance complete with Donkey Kong tournaments and new arcades that resurrect forgotten games.

programme.title: Márquez Unlimited
programme.sub-title: Marc Márquez's journey to his eighth world title
programme.desc: After surgery and rehabilitation, Marc Márquez returned ready for the 2019 MotoGP™ season. After undergoing major surgery and rehabilitation between seasons, Marc Márquez returned for the 2019 MotoGP™ season determined to claim back-to-back victories.

programme.title: Mitya
programme.desc: Russia's promising musician explores the Tatarstan region of his homeland for lost songs and new inspiration. Producer-singer-songwriter Mitya explores the region of Tatarstan, Russia, where he grew up. Along the way, he collects audio samples, meets local musicians and finds inspiration for his own work.

programme.title: Drew Bezanson
programme.desc: Since his first BMX drop-in in 2010, Drew Bezanson has gone on to win an incredible five times. BMX rider Drew Bezanson has a second home-like place: the podium at the Simple Session in Estonia. Since his first drop-in in 2010, he’s gone on to win an incredible five times.

programme.title: Jonny Walker
programme.desc: Riding since the age of nine, Jonny Walker is the future of Hard Enduro. Riding since the age of nine, Jonny Walker is the future of Hard Enduro. Take a journey with Jonny and find out what drives him to succeed.

programme.title: Treasure island
programme.desc: Chris Haslam and the crew arrive in Crete to take advantage of the island's skate-friendly plazas and streets. Chris Haslam, Sierra Fellers, Max Kruglov, Dima Rodionov, Yura Renov and Giorgio Zavos arrive in Crete to take advantage of the island's skate-friendly plazas and streets.

programme.title: Keep your eyes open
programme.desc: When cruising through Crete, keeping an eye on the surroundings can mean finding the best skate spots. Chris Haslam, Max Kruglov and the crew find that keeping an eye out while sightseeing can uncover epic skate spots. Some banks, rails, and ledges spied by accident wind up resulting in killer shots.

programme.title: Generations of Freeskiing
programme.desc: Take a thrilling ride through the story of freestyle skiing, its origins and how it continues to develop. Dive deep into the story of freestyle skiing, its origins, and how it continues to develop. In the fluid style of a top-to-bottom run that reaches across eras, take a thrilling ride through history.

programme.title: Pushing the Limits
programme.desc: Take a look at the people who are expanding the boundaries of capability and performance in action sports. From free diving to freeskiing, kite surfing to kayaking, action sports athletes and adventurers have a relationship with nature that's hard for most to comprehend: one driven by the need to leave comfort zones and expand the realms of possibility.

programme.title: Bella Vita
programme.desc: The waves of the Italian coast call surfer Chris Del Moro on a pilgrimage back to his ancestral homeland. The waves of the Italian coast call surfer Chris Del Moro on a pilgrimage back to his ancestral homeland, where he explores how old-world conventions and traditions have given rise to a unique modern surf lifestyle and destination.

programme.title: Finding Form
programme.desc: From the juniors to the elites, winning is a matter of capturing an elusive blend of fitness and confidence. From the juniors to the elites, winning is a matter of capturing an elusive blend of fitness and confidence. It’s easier said than done, especially come race day on World Cup track.

programme.title: Flats and Falls
programme.desc: The riders tirelessly prepare for the race at Mont-Sainte-Anne, Canada, but some variables are unavoidable. Weather, injuries, and flat tyres, three variables that no amount of practice or training can control. As the riders prepare for the race at Mont-Sainte-Anne, Canada they reflect on the crazy and unpredictable events they've faced along the way.

programme.title: Higher Ground
programme.desc: Thomas de Dorlodot and Horacio Llorens journeyed for a personal adventure across the Himalayan mountains. Thomas de Dorlodot and Horacio Llorens journeyed for a personal adventure across the Himalayan mountains. They covered roughly 350km and became the very first paragliders to fly over Rohtang Pass.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: After both facing defeat in France, Kanoa Igarashi and Steph Gilmore move onward and upward in Portugal. After both facing defeat in France, Kanoa Igarashi and Steph Gilmore put that behind them to continue the fight. Igarashi and Gilmore both move onward and upward at Meo Rip Curl Pro Portugal.

programme.title: Mosaik Diaries
programme.sub-title: Red Bull Listening Session: Camo & Krooked
programme.desc: Be first to experience Camo & Krooked's album, Mosaik, in an exclusive listening party and in-depth interview. Austrian electronic duo Camo & Krooked drop their long-awaited studio album, Mosaik, with an exclusive listening party and in-depth interview. Experience the music along with 300 friends and get insight from the band on each track.

programme.title: Glenn Coldenhoff
programme.sub-title: Road to Red Bull Knock Out
programme.desc: Glenn Coldenhoff has a goal in 2018: to place within the top three of Red Bull Knock Out. Glenn Coldenhoff has competed in two previous Red Bull Knock Out races and in 2018 his goal is to place within the top three. See how he has been training and preparing his bike to achieve this goal.
